hw_api->dbstat

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api->dbstat — Returns statistics about database server

Description

hw_api
hw_api_object dbstat ( array $parameter )

Returns statistics about database server.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values
